page.title: 15NEWS ITEMS-GOOSTREY AREA 2
page.content:
The W.I.are to provide a needlework display and a float for Goostrey Rose Day.
Jodrell Bank is to stage an exhibition about Halley's Comet.
Goostrey gooseberry growers are preparing for the show in July. News has reached them of a grower from Peover who has "Quads" - four berries on a single stem - a great rarity.
The church wardens of St Luke's Parish Church presented a cheque and gifts to the Vicar, the Rev.H.Huggill, who is retiring after nine years at Goostrey.
Goostrey Flower club had a talk and demonstration entitled "Out and About" at their regular monthly meeting in the Village Hall.
